workshoptitle: Manage schema objects in Oracle Database 23ai using Database Actions

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Prepare Setup
tutorials.description: How to download your ORM stack and update security rules for an existing VCN.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Setup Compute Instance
tutorials.description: How to provision the workshop environment and connect to it

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Initialize Environment
tutorials.description: How to initialize and start all the workshop components.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Manage Tables
tutorials.description: How to manage tables in Oracle Database 23ai using Database Actions.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Create Indexes and Views
tutorials.description: How to create indexes and views in Oracle Database 23ai using Database Actions.

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Manage Program code stored in Oracle Database
tutorials.description: How to manage program code stored in Oracle Database 23ai using Database Actions.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
